response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,
I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our flagship product, which holds immense value and significance for us. This product has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet the highest standards of excellence, and we believe it would greatly benefit you and align perfectly with your needs and aspirations.

We are offering this remarkable product to you at a special introductory price of $1,100,000. This offer represents a significant saving compared to its market value of $1,200,000, and we hope it will be attractive enough to consider your acquisition.

Please let us know if you require any further information or have questions about the product. We are more than happy to provide you with detailed specifications, testimonials from satisfied customers, or arrange a personal demonstration to ensure you are fully informed before making a decision.

We look forward to the possibility of working with you and contributing to your success with this exceptional product. Should you choose to proceed, we can arrange for immediate delivery and provide you with all necessary support and services to ensure a seamless experience.

Warm regards,
Alice", "product_price": 1100000}
